snippet: Absent from the playoffs the last 15 seasons, the Orioles continued their miracle season Friday night, edging the Rangers, 5-1, behind Joe Saunders and three relievers.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column focuses on Baltimore Orioles, who continue their miracle season by defeating Texas Rangers in MLB's first one-game wild card playoff.
lead_paragraph: Absent from the playoffs the last 15 seasons, the Orioles continued their miracle season Friday night, edging the Rangers, 5-1, behind Joe Saunders and three relievers.

headline.seo: Orioles Await Yankees After Returning to Playoffs in Style
headline.main: Returning to Playoffs in Style, Orioles Await Yankees
headline.print_headline: Returning to Playoffs in Style, Orioles Await Yankees
